name: Bizzar
description:
This is a special art to celebrate the horror month, this piece is inspired in the actress Shelley Duvall known by her work on the classic horror movie The Shining. 

The art was made using scenes of the movie where  i applied some distortions and other effects on her face to make more macabre and terrify,  I made some color distortions and aplied some videos filter to finish with a flourish.
